tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Thank you so much Dr. Balaji Jaganmohan Sir and Friendly staff and very kind in taking care of Patients.

I had the privilege of being under the care of Dr. Balaji Jaganmohan, an exceptional diabetic doctor, and it is with great pleasure that I share my experience. Bring down my HBA1c levels from 11.2 to 6.2 which is really incredible.

One aspect that truly impressed me was Dr. Balaji Jaganmohan's commitment to a holistic approach to diabetes management. They not only addressed my medical needs but also emphasized the importance of lifestyle modifications, including diet and exercise.

Their comprehensive guidance helped me make significant positive changes in my daily routine, leading to improved blood glucose control and overall well-being.

If you're searching for a diabetic doctor who combines expertise, compassion, and a holistic approach to care, I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Balaji Jaganmohan. They are a beacon of hope for anyone seeking comprehensive and personalized diabetes management. With them by your side, you'll undoubtedly be on the path to better health and a brighter future.

What should I say about this doctor, he is a great human being *** * ****** ******. He knows how to handle even a critical patients. We went to him 3 months back where in my mother's sugar level was almost 500 but after taking treatment from him, it has come down to 120. My mother had almost left the hope that she would get any better at one point but this doctor has given her a new life. He don't just give medicines and take back seat, his staff does the regular follow up to find out patient's health condition which is a good part about them. Thanks a lot to you and your staff. You guys are awesome.

My wife insisted me to go meet Dr Balaji Jagmohan ( I live in CV Ramn Nagar and Doctor who is practicing in Padmanabha Nagar ) I had no idea about the relief i am going to get .... To my surprise when i checked my Blood sugar ( Accu check ) after a week as per doctors advice, before fasting and the reading was 76 ! I couldn't believe it and once again checked my sugar level through my  other Johnson Glucometer and it was also showing 78. my self and my family is so happy and also my insulin is reduced from present 80 to 24 units. I am sure with in no time i will be out of this painful insulin. We are grateful to this wonderful human being for suggesting us the right path ahead... Thank you Doctor and God Bless.

I am having the Sugar for the last 12-15 years.I have been getting treatment from different Doctors. But my sugar management was not proper and it used to be very erratic. Now I am getting treatment from Dr. Balaji Jagan Mohan fo the past 2 years. When came to him my HBa1c reading was 10 + . within a quarter it was brought down to 7. I am  regularly get the check up every 3 months. now my HbA1c reading is maintained around 7 since then. besides the Diabetic management the Dr. is like a personal friend I feel at home to discuss any personal problems. He is very approachable and friendly and discusses problems openly. I am very happy with him.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
*** ****** *** *** ****** *** ******* ** ******* **** **** ******** *** ********* **** **** ***** **** **** *** **** ******** ***** *** ****** *** ** ***** **** *********** **** ** **** ****** *** **** ******** ***** ******* 

You won't meet the doctor directly, someone will sit with you and talk to you in length about the negative side effects of diabetes to your body* ** *** **** *** ***** ** **** ** ******* *** **** ** ** ******* *** ***** *** ** ****** *** ** *** ********* 

In my case, I visited the doctor in May 2019, with HBA1C level of 6.9 after reducing it from 7.9 in 3 months. I went there just to get an expert's opinion. In spite of me telling him repeatedly that I would like to normalize sugar levels using diet and exercise first, as that's how I reduced the previous levels, he kept on insisting to start with low dosages of medications. 

I told them NO *** ******* ** ********* ** ***** ****** ** ******** ******** ************ ******* *** ******** **** ******* *** ********** ******* *** ******* **** ** ** ***** 

The reason I am writing the review now is, the hospital and also their call center keeps calling me every month for the last 1 year, in spite of me telling them not to harass me to take tests ** * ** ****** ***** *** ******* 

I am writing here hoping they would stop contacting me by phone, emailing and sms. This is literally harassment for the mistake of visiting them once. *** ******* *** ****** ** **** ** *** ******** ** ****** *** *** ** *********

I am happy to see my and my family members sugar has came under control thanks to Dr.Balaji and entire team

Thanks to Dr.Balaji jagan mohan

It has been a great journey, HbA1c (9.8  to 6.8) had come down significantly along with reduction in insulin intake(48 units to 10units) and significant amount of weight loss in about 8-9 months.  He gives good picture of the situation and explain how a prescribed drug would perform, gives a lot of confidence that we are in safe hands.

******* ******* Its is an come back for my dad who had Diabetes and was unable to control sugar. With proper analysis and new age treatment the Insulin Dosage has been reduced from 110 units per day to 40 Units. 

Great Experience and Thanks a Ton Doctor

I am really happy that i found this clinic and Dr.Balaji Jaganmohan.
My mother's sugar level was very high and i have never noticed it in a normal range for a couple of years. We consulted Dr.Balaji and initialy he suggested to go with insulin, but then he said to try with a tablets for month. It worked very well for my mother and her sugar level is normal now. Thanks to Dr.Balaji sir.

*** ****** ** * ***** ******* very helpful - *** **** ********* *** ********** * he has great patience which is a must for all doctors - we would certainly recommend Dr. Balaji to our family and friends - we wish Dr. Balaji best of luck in all his endeavors and pray God to bless him with good health and long life and help him to help many people to maintain good health.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Firstly waiting time more than 2 hours from appointment slot. Secondly, I request Doctor to see patient and understand the issues and then advise whether to continue same medicines / go for blood tests Not just ask Nurse to advise and ask to do all the tests and come. 
Without even seeing patient and writing all blood tests in small slip and take 750rs consultation. And asking if need to enter in file, another 100 rs extra. which is very pathetic and totally unfair.
 I didn't expect from a familiar apollo clinic.

Very patient and to the point. Explains the report in detail and suggests best practices. I visited in Apollo clinic, even supporting staff was very helpful in noting down required details from medical report.

I am Malini Shankar, am a photojournalist, in a very stressful profession. Despite being disciplined with yoga, diet, medication and doctor's consultation, my blood glucose level was high for about 18 - 20 months and I finally met Dr. Balaji Jaganmohan through social networking in August 2016. He heard my intolerance to certain medication, advised me on the significance of a diet regimen, put me on new medication and 1 month review has shown that blood sugar and blood pressure have come down, so has my weight and BMI. It left me with tears of gratitude in my eyes today when I met him on 27.09.16. I am trying to spread the word around to my circles so that everyone benefits with better health quotient. I am capable of working with him as a team. I wish others too, to get better under his guidance. May his tribe increase.
cheers
Malini
